thread.section_title: eSpares.co.uk Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.espares.co.uk
thread.title: Mr Colin Coe
thread.title_full: eSpares.co.uk reviewed by Mr Colin Coe

author: Mr Colin Coe
title: Mr Colin Coe
text:
E Spares service excellent although replacement part did not resolve fault. Purchased Hoover filter to replace no longer available Holme/Adobe spares. The Hoover part fitted perfectly but not needed. Subsequently stripped cleaner down to encounter broken plastic lever mounts!
Suggest that Hoover-Holme-Adobe products all made in same factory in China? Buy cheap, but twice!
